General.Name: SCI AG
General.Description: SCI AG is a publicly owned investment manager. It specializes in small capitalization stocks with a focus on businesses involved in squeeze-outs and takeovers. The firm primarily focuses on german small cap stocks, particularly in the area of takeovers and structural measures. The firm provides its services to Institutional and private investors. SCI AG was founded in 2000 and is based in Usingen, Germany.
